ldlm_flock_lookup_cb_data Struct Reference

POSIX locks deadlock detection code. More...

Data Fields

__u64 * bl_owner
struct ldlm_lock * lock
struct obd_export * exp

Detailed Description

POSIX locks deadlock detection code.

Given a new lock req and an existing lock bl_lock it conflicts with, we need to iterate through all blocked POSIX locks for this export and see if there is a deadlock condition arising. (i.e. when one client holds a lock on something and want a lock on something else and at the same time another client has the opposite situation).

Definition at line 167 of file ldlm_flock.c.
